text: Ðis syndon þa landgemæro to madan leage ærest on witena leage in eardel of eardele in wriman ford of wriman forda ondlong broces on hedenan mos of hedenan mose ymbe heafca bæce.

Of þan bæce on þone hege of þon hege on wilburge wege of þæm wege in cærsihtan wyll of þæm wylle in þa dic of þære dic in<../images/tbar.gif>micle mos of þæm mose in<../images/tbar.gif>sic of þæm sice in wierdes ford.
Of wierdes forda on þone hreodihtan mor of þon more in þa hæþihtan lege of þære lege in þa hyrste on þa greatan ac of þære ac in<../images/tbar.gif>sic of þæm sice eft on witena leage.
Þis is þara III hida boc þe Eadgar cing gebocode Aþelwolde bisceope on ece yrfe æt Madan liege.
